: Anonymization of and Information Extraction from Medical (User-Generated) Texts

This project’s aim is (1) to develop new methods for the anonymization of patient-sensitive data in texts in the medical domain and (2) to extract relevant disease and drug mentions from user-generated texts. In the course of the project the team members a required to survey the current state-of-the-art for both tasks and to implement systems for both tasks on their own. Exact tasks per team member will be discussed within the team.
- Interest in Natural Language Processing (NLP) and the medical/health domain
- Background/experience in NLP and/or Machine Learning
- Willingness and ability to work independently but also within a team
- High motivation to dive deeply into the field
